## OWebI18n.toHuman() method

Returns i18n translation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toHuman(key: OI18n, data?: OI18nData, pluralize?: OI18nPluralize, lang?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | [OI18n](./oweb.oi18n.md) | The i18n string key. |
|  data | [OI18nData](./oweb.oi18ndata.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The data to inject in translation process. |
|  pluralize | [OI18nPluralize](./oweb.oi18npluralize.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  lang | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The i18n lang code to use. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
